content:
Hi. I am getting an error while updateing from git master:

Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-install-bpt2mgmq/talon/
You are using pip version 19.0.1, however version 19.0.3 is available.
You should consider upgrading via the 'pip install --upgrade pip' command.

Error running a subcommand of /home/zulip/deployments/2019-02-26-13-27-40/scripts/lib/create-production-venv: /srv/zulip-venv-cache/4cfed786731bb9f2347553f7edb35ee4667b71cb/zulip-py3-venv/bin/pip install --no-deps --requirement /home/zulip/deployments/2019-02-26-13-27-40/requirements/prod.txt
Actual error output for the subcommand is just above this.
@Fabian Tribrunner can you post the output above what you posted? It's pretty clear from that output that this is not the actual error.
(The pip thing you displayed is a warning that pip prints about new versions being available, and isn't interesting)
@Tim Abbott i thought that too. but the update does not run through....
I will try to reproduce it later.
